thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Corrections & Amplifications

author: wsjcom
title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
0 COMMENTS Chinese President Xi Jinping toured Microsoft Corp. MSFT 0.09 % ’s Redmond, Wash., campus Wednesday. A Business & Tech section article on Thursday about deals Microsoft struck with Chinese companies incorrectly said Mr. Xi’s tour of the campus was set to take place Thursday.
Groupon GRPN -0.80 % Inc.’s quarterly revenue has risen this year, when adjusted for discontinued operations. A Heard on the Street article Thursday about the company incorrectly said revenue began showing year-over-year declines this year.
Jessica Martin has biked from the top of Colorado’s Mount Evans to its base. A Personal Journal article Thursday about mountain biking on the state’s high peaks incorrectly said she rode down all 14,271 feet, a distance that represents the summit’s elevation above sea level.
In some editions Thursday, the first and last names of Caldwell Bailey, a consultant at IHS, were incorrectly reversed in a Business & Tech article about the struggles of some hydraulic fracturing companies.
